paper_abstract: We discuss in this paper the form of the solutions of the following recursive sequences x(n+1) = x(n-3)x(n-4)/x(n)(+/-1 +/- x(n-3)x(n-4)), n = 0, 1, ..., where the initial conditions are arbitrary real numbers. Moreover, we study the dynamics and behavior of the solutions.
paper_title: The Form of The Solution and Dynamics of a Rational Recursive Sequence
